Google地图各级比例尺及空间分辨率

| Level | Scale            | Resolution       |
|-------|------------------|------------------|
| 0     | 591657527.591555 | 156543.033928023 |
| 1     | 295828763.795778 | 78271.5169640117 |
| 2     | 147914381.897889 | 39135.7584820059 |
| 3     | 73957190.9489444 | 19567.8792410029 |
| 4     | 36978595.4744722 | 9783.93962050147 |
| 5     | 18489297.7372361 | 4891.96981025073 |
| 6     | 9244648.86861805 | 2445.98490512537 |
| 7     | 4622324.43430902 | 1222.99245256268 |
| 8     | 2311162.21715451 | 611.496226281342 |
| 9     | 1155581.10857726 | 305.748113140671 |
| 10    | 577790.554288628 | 152.874056570335 |
| 11    | 288895.277144314 | 76.4370282851677 |
| 12    | 144447.638572157 | 38.2185141425838 |
| 13    | 72223.8192860785 | 19.1092570712919 |
| 14    | 36111.9096430392 | 9.55462853564596 |
| 15    | 18055.9548215196 | 4.77731426782298 |
| 16    | 9027.97741075981 | 2.38865713391149 |
| 17    | 4513.98870537991 | 1.19432856695575 |
| 18    | 2256.99435268995 | 0.597164283477873 |
| 19    | 1128.49717634498 | 0.298582141738936 |

`Level`:等级 \
`Scale`:比例尺 \
`Resolution`:分辨率，单位(`m`)

等级之间相差2的n次方
```
let zoom = map.getZoom()
let Resolution = 156543.033928023
let plottingScale = Math.trunc(Resolution / Math.pow(2, Number(zoom)))
// 比例尺：1:{{ plottingScale }}
```
